DOC.brief_summary: Aims : Pre-eclampsia one leading cause maternal perinatal morbidity mortality worldwide . Preeclampsia frequency 2-8 % pregnancy . Dietary factor dietary status suggest play role development preeclampsia . Low intake nutrient calcium , vitamin D , magnesium , omega 3 fatty acid , relate increase risk preeclampsia . Also high triglyceride level , high BMI , low Omega 6 : omega 3 ratio high calorie consumption possible risk factor . Material Methods : A prospective study carry . Woman medically diagnose high risk preeclampsia randomly assign dietary treatment dietary treatment group . In dietary treatment group , besides medical care , woman get calcium vitamin D supplementation 8th 16th gestational week , thereafter delivery personal extensive nutritional guidance . A 3 day food diary collect inclusion thereafter Gestational week 16 28 . All routinely collect data pregnancy ( blood test , weight , blood pressure preeclampsia symptom ) document . In group incidence pre-eclampsia eclampsia , blood pressure protein urine record .
DOC.brief_title: Dietary Intervention Program Pre-eclampsia Women Risk

Dietary factor dietary status suggest play role development preeclampsia . Low intake nutrient calcium , vitamin D , magnesium , omega 3 fatty acid , relate increase risk preeclampsia . Also high triglyceride level , high BMI , low Omega 6 : omega 3 ratio high calorie consumption possible risk factor . Material Methods : A prospective study carry . Woman medically diagnose high risk preeclampsia randomly assign dietary treatment dietary treatment group . In dietary treatment group , besides medical care , woman get calcium vitamin D supplementation 8th 16th gestational week , thereafter delivery personal extensive nutritional guidance . A 3 day food diary collect inclusion thereafter Gestational week 16 28 . All routinely collect data pregnancy ( blood test , weight , blood pressure preeclampsia symptom ) document . DOC.criteria: high risk preeclampsia age 18 low risk preeclampsia
